Deathtouch, Flash
If you would take damage from a source an opponent controls you may have Passionlip, Obsessive Stalker take that damage instead.
Whenever Passionlip takes damage from a source an opponent controls its controller exiles that many cards from the top of their library

First strike
Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks you Nobunaga deals 1 damage to that creature and 1 damage to its controller.
Whenever you cast a creature spell target creature an opponent controls must attack on their controllers next turn.
